forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers. Partly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 7pm. Partly cloudy. Low around 35, with temperatures rising to around 37 overnight. West northwest wind around 17 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 44, with temperatures falling to around 41 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 16 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 29. West northwest wind 7 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.
